alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:08AM MST until March 11 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. West winds gusting 40 to 55 mph behind a frontal passage. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Bands of intense snow showers will bring rapid and significant reductions in visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute, especially along I-90 from Big Timber through Livingston, and Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Intense snow showers will occur with a frontal passage between 3-8 PM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1 or visit the MDT Road Report website.
